import React, {useContext} from 'react' import Context from '../Context' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Footer from '../componentes/Footer' import NavBar from "../componentes/NavBar" const Carrito = () => { const {addToCar, incrementar, decrement} = useContext (Context); const total = addToCar.reduce((a, {count, price}) => a + price*count, 0); return ( <>
Detalles del pedido:
{addToCar.map((producto, i) => (
{producto.name}
${(producto.price*producto.count).toLocaleString("es-Cl")}
{producto.count}
))}

Total: ${total.toLocaleString("es-Cl")}

) } export default Carrito
